That engagement ring is barely settled on Nikki Bella's finger, but it sounds like this WWE star already knows what she wants to wear down the aisle, down to the very last seam. (Show us your ways, girl!) Fresh off her proposal from John Cena, Bella is spilling on her wedding dress details . And, TBH, the gown sounds totally gorgeous—and kinda sexy! Basically, everything you'd expect from one of these Total Divas .

At last weekend's WrestleMania 33, WWE wrestler John Cena popped the question to Bella , pulling out a diamond ring right in the middle of the wrestling ring! Recalling the moments before Bella went into surgery last year, Cena said, "At the last moment, I said, 'Can you hear me?' You said, 'Yes.' I said, 'I only have one question.' You said, 'What is it?' 'Do you know one day I'm going to marry you?' And you said, 'Yes.' I just need you to say yes one more time. I have been waiting so long to ask you this, will you marry me?"

Of course the answer was yes, and then it was on to wedding planning for this bride-to-be as soon as she changed out of those trademark booty shorts! While she definitely won't be rocking her work-wear down the aisle—i.e. those itty bitty bottoms and sports bras—she does want one Nikki Bella style staple incorporated into her wedding day look: Cleavage!

"Who's Nikki Bella without cleavage? Like c'mon!" Bella told E! News about her dream wedding dress. "I want something that's tight in the waist and shows off the booty," she explained. "I definitely have to have some cleavage."

See More: John Cena Just Revealed He Custom-Designed Nikki Bella's Engagement Ring

While a sultry silhouette is a must for this bride-to-be, Bella is also considering a lacy fabric—but wants to steer clear of anything too poofy. "I feel like I'm too old for that," she said.

Bella is planning to stun in two different wedding dresses on the big day—one for the ceremony and one for the reception. And while she's been waiting some time for Cena to pop the question (the couple have been dating since 2012), she's mentioned one major benefit to tying the knot now.

"I can only imagine what I would've picked in my 20s—geez!" she said.

Preach, girl.
title: Nikki Bella Already Knows Exactly What She Wants Her Wedding Dress to Look Like
